tool_description: Sends escalation notifications to stakeholders via multiple channels (email, SMS, Slack) with customizable templates and delivery confirmation.

notification_type.description: Type of notification (escalation, sla_warning, breach_alert, assignment)

error_messages: Invalid notification type: Type must be one of [escalation, sla_warning, breach_alert, assignment].
Invalid priority level: Priority must be one of [low, medium, high, urgent]. Check escalation requirements.
Invalid delivery channels: Channels must be from [email, sms, slack, teams]. Verify channel availability.
Empty recipients list: At least one recipient must be specified in the recipients array.
Invalid delivery schedule: Schedule must be one of [immediate, business_hours, scheduled].
Template not found: The specified template_id does not exist. Use default template or create custom template.
Delivery failure: Failed to deliver notification via specified channels. Check recipient availability and channel configuration.
usage: Specify notification details including type, recipients, and channels. The tool handles template selection, message formatting, and multi-channel delivery with confirmation tracking.
